title: Train Signalling Fault on North-South Line

title_translations.ms: Rosak Isyarat Kereta Api di Laluan Utara-Selatan

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #ChoaChuKang & #JurongEast is running normally now. Free regular bus services have ceased.
[NSL]UPDATE:Train signalling fault has cleared, trains are progressively returning to normal speed. Free bus service is still available.
[NSL]: Due to a train signalling fault, pls add 20mins travelling time between #ChoaChuKang & #JurongEast.
